column12: Earn 5x points per $1 spent on eligible dining transactions, 2x points on travel and 1 point on all other spend.
Earn 2x points for every $1 in Card purchases on eligible travel and everyday purchases, 1x point for every $1 in Card purchases everywhere else

Earn 5x points for every $1 in eligible Card purchases at participating Marriott Bonvoy properties
Earn 2x points for every $1 in all other Card purchases
Enjoy an earn rate of 1 Reward Mile for every $15 in Card purchases at AIR MILES Sponsors and 1 Reward Mile for every $20 in Card purchases everywhere else.
1.25% cash back on purchases when your Welcome Rate ends
Earn 1x Aeroplan Mile for every $1 in Card purchases up to $10,000. Accelerate your earn rate to 1.25 Aeroplan Miles for every additional $1 in Card purchases over $10,000 annually
2x points for every $1 in Card purchases on eligible travel
Earn 1 Aeroplan Mile for every $1 in Card purchases
Earn 1.25x Aeroplan Mile for every $1 in Card purchases up to $10,000. Accelerate your earn rate to 1.5 Aeroplan Miles for every additional $1 in Card purchases over $10,000 annually
Earn 1.25 Aeroplan Miles for every $1 in Card purchases. Plus earn 2 Aeroplan Miles for every $1 of eligible Air Canada purchases

Earn 1 Reward Mile for every $10 in Card purchases at AIR MILES®* Sponsors and eligible grocery stores, gas stations, and drugstores in Canada. Rean 1 Reward Mile for every $15 in Card purchases everywhere else

Earn 1 Reward Mile for every $10 in Card purchases at AIR MILES®* Sponsors and eligible grocery stores, gas stations, and drugstores in Canada. Earn 1 Reward Mile for every $15 in Card purchases everywhere else
Earn 5% cashback in your first 6 months Earn 2% cash back when your Welcome Rate ends
